title: Charming intimate contemporary subtlely hip yet elegant understated sophisticated
text: Near Restaurant Row and within easy walking distance of busy Times Square, 414 Hotel is a small, calm and intimate haven. From the charming leafy patio with small round mosaic tables, to the smart, sensually pleasing bedrooms with striking photographic cityscapes and sumptuous white down comforters and natural fiber sheets, this hotel is about good taste, intimacy and conviviality. In fact, guests breakfast all together at a long attractively stained table brightened by flowers at each end. It is no wonder that this small, tucked away gem-of-a-hotel attracts many Europeans in addition to folks from the U.S. and other points abroad.
